title: Joe Biden Finally Allows Ukraine to Hit Certain Targets Inside Russia
description:
As Donald Trump is about to take control of the United Statesâ€™ role in the Ukraine/Russia conflict, Joe Biden approves of Ukraine using long-range missiles on military targets inside Russia. What took him so long and how will the incoming administration respond?
